channel.title: welcome to my world • Posts by "java入门" category
channel.category: C语言大一上学期期末复习

item.title: 翻译字典
计算机-Java

class="keyword">import</span> javax.swing.*;</span><br><span class="line"><span class="keyword">import</span> java.awt.event.*;</span><br><span class="line"><span class="keyword">import</span> java.util.ArrayList;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"><span class="keyword">public</span> <span class="keyword">class</span> <span class="title class_">AdvancedCalculator</span> <span class="keyword">extends</span> <span class="title class_">JFrame</span> <span class="keyword">implements</span> <span class="title class_">ActionListener</span> &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">private</span> JButton[] numberButtons = <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">JButton</span>[<span class="number">10</span>];</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">private</span> JButton addButton, subButton, mulButton, divButton, equalButton, clearButton;</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">private</span> JButton powButton, sqrtButton, sinButton, cosButton, tanButton, historyButton;</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">private</span> JTextField textField;</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">private</span> <span class="type">String</span> <span class="variable">display</span> <span class="operator">=</span> <span class="string">&quot;&quot;</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">private</span> <span class="type">double</span> <span class="variable">tempFirst</span> <span class="operator">=</span> <span class="number">0</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">private</span> <span class="type">double</span> <span class="variable">tempSecond</span> <span class="operator">=</span> <span class="number">0</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">private</span> <span class="type">char</span> operator;</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">private</span> ArrayList&lt;String&gt; history = <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">ArrayList</span>&lt;&gt;();</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">private</span> JButton dotButton;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">public</span> <span class="title function_">AdvancedCalculator</span><span class="params">()</span> &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> createComponents();</span><br><span class="line"> setLayout(<span class="literal">null</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> setSize(<span class="number">300</span>, <span class="number">500</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> setVisible(<span class="literal">true</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> setDefaultCloseOperation(EXIT_ON_CLOSE);</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">private</span> <span class="keyword">void</span> <span class="title function_">createComponents</span><span class="params">()</span> &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> textField = <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">JTextField</span>();</span><br><span class="line"> textField.setBounds(<span class="number">50</span>, <span class="number">50</span>, <span class="number">200</span>, <span class="number">50</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> add(textField);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> addButton = <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">JButton</span>(<span class="string">&quot;+&quot;</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> subButton = <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">JButton</span>(<span class="string">&quot;-&quot;</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> mulButton = <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">JButton</span>(<span class="string">&quot;*&quot;</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> divButton = <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">JButton</span>(<span class="string">&quot;/&quot;</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> equalButton = <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">JButton</span>(<span class="string">&quot;=&quot;</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> clearButton = <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">JButton</span>(<span class="string">&quot;C&quot;</span>);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> powButton = <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">JButton</span>(<span class="string">&quot;^&quot;</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> sqrtButton = <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">JButton</span>(<span class="string">&quot;√&quot;</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> sinButton = <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">JButton</span>(<span class="string">&quot;sin&quot;</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> cosButton = <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">JButton</span>(<span class="string">&quot;cos&quot;</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> tanButton = <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">JButton</span>(<span class="string">&quot;tan&quot;</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> historyButton = <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">JButton</span>(<span class="string">&quot;History&quot;</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//附加</span></span><br><span class="line"> dotButton = <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">JButton</span>(<span class="string">&quot;.&quot;</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> dotButton.setBounds(<span class="number">150</span>, <span class="number">300</span>, <span class="number">50</span>, <span class="number">50</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> add(dotButton);</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//绑定事件</span></span><br><span class="line"> dotButton.addActionListener(<span class="built_in">this</span>);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> addButton.setBounds(<span class="number">200</span>, <span class="number">250</span>, <span class="number">50</span>, <span class="number">50</span>);<span class="comment">//+</span></span><br><span class="line"> subButton.setBounds(<span class="number">200</span>, <span class="number">200</span>, <span class="number">50</span>, <span class="number">50</span>);<span class="comment">//-</span></span><br><span class="line"> mulButton.setBounds(<span class="number">200</span>, <span class="number">150</span>, <span class="number">50</span>, <span class="number">50</span>);<span class="comment">//*</span></span><br><span class="line"> divButton.setBounds(<span class="number">200</span>, <span class="number">100</span>, <span class="number">50</span>, <span class="number">50</span>);<span class="comment">//÷</span></span><br><span class="line"> equalButton.setBounds(<span class="number">200</span>, <span class="number">300</span>, <span class="number">50</span>, <span class="number">50</span>);<span class="comment">//=</span></span><br><span class="line"> clearButton.setBounds(<span class="number">50</span>, <span class="number">100</span>, <span class="number">50</span>, <span class="number">50</span>);<span class="comment">//清空</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> powButton.setBounds(<span class="number">50</span>, <span class="number">300</span>, <span class="number">50</span>, <span class="number">50</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> sqrtButton.setBounds(<span class="number">50</span>, <span class="number">350</span>, <span class="number">100</span>, <span class="number">50</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> sinButton.setBounds(<span class="number">150</span>, <span class="number">350</span>, <span class="number">100</span>, <span class="number">50</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> cosButton.setBounds(<span class="number">50</span>, <span class="number">400</span>, <span class="number">100</span>, <span class="number">50</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> tanButton.setBounds(<span class="number">150</span>, <span class="number">400</span>, <span class="number">100</span>, <span class="number">50</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> historyButton.setBounds(<span class="number">100</span>, <span class="number">100</span>, <span class="number">100</span>, <span class="number">50</span>);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> add(addButton);</span><br><span class="line"> add(subButton);</span><br><span class="line"> add(mulButton);</span><br><span class="line"> add(divButton);</span><br><span class="line"> add(equalButton);</span><br><span class="line"> add(clearButton);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> add(powButton);</span><br><span class="line"> add(sqrtButton);</span><br><span class="line"> add(sinButton);</span><br><span class="line"> add(cosButton);</span><br><span class="line"> add(tanButton);</span><br><span class="line"> add(historyButton);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">for</span> (<span class="type">int</span> <span class="variable">i</span> <span class="operator">=</span> <span class="number">1</span>; i &lt; <span class="number">10</span>; i++) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> numberButtons[i] = <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">JButton</span>(String.valueOf(i));</span><br><span class="line"> numberButtons[i].setBounds(<span class="number">50</span> + ((i-<span class="number">1</span>) % <span class="number">3</span>) * <span class="number">50</span>, <span class="number">150</span> + ((i-<span class="number">1</span>) / <span class="number">3</span>) * <span class="number">50</span>, <span class="number">50</span>, <span class="number">50</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> add(numberButtons[i]);</span><br><span class="line"> numberButtons[i].addActionListener(<span class="built_in">this</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> numberButtons[<span class="number">0</span>]=<span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">JButton</span>(String.valueOf(<span class="number">0</span>));</span><br><span class="line"> numberButtons[<span class="number">0</span>].setBounds(<span class="number">100</span>,<span class="number">300</span>,<span class="number">50</span>,<span class="number">50</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> add(numberButtons[<span class="number">0</span>]);</span><br><span class="line"> numberButtons[<span class="number">0</span>].addActionListener(<span class="built_in">this</span>);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> addButton.addActionListener(<span class="built_in">this</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> subButton.addActionListener(<span class="built_in">this</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> mulButton.addActionListener(<span class="built_in">this</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> divButton.addActionListener(<span class="built_in">this</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> equalButton.addActionListener(<span class="built_in">this</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> clearButton.addActionListener(<span class="built_in">this</span>);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> powButton.addActionListener(<span class="built_in">this</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> sqrtButton.addActionListener(<span class="built_in">this</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> sinButton.addActionListener(<span class="built_in">this</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> cosButton.addActionListener(<span class="built_in">this</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> tanButton.addActionListener(<span class="built_in">this</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> historyButton.addActionListener(<span class="built_in">this</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="meta">@Override</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">public</span> <span class="keyword">void</span> <span class="title function_">actionPerformed</span><span class="params">(ActionEvent e)</span> &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">for</span> (<span class="type">int</span> <span class="variable">i</span> <span class="operator">=</span> <span class="number">0</span>; i &lt; <span class="number">10</span>; i++) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">if</span> (e.getSource() == numberButtons[i]) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> display += i;</span><br><span class="line"> textField.setText(display);</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">return</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">if</span> (e.getSource() == addButton) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> tempFirst = Double.parseDouble(display);</span><br><span class="line"> operator = <span class="string">&#x27;+&#x27;</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> display = <span class="string">&quot;&quot;</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125; <span class="keyword">else</span> <span class="keyword">if</span> (e.getSource() == subButton) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> tempFirst = Double.parseDouble(display);</span><br><span class="line"> operator = <span class="string">&#x27;-&#x27;</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> display = <span class="string">&quot;&quot;</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125; <span class="keyword">else</span> <span class="keyword">if</span> (e.getSource() == mulButton) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> tempFirst = Double.parseDouble(display);</span><br><span class="line"> operator = <span class="string">&#x27;*&#x27;</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> display = <span class="string">&quot;&quot;</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125; <span class="keyword">else</span> <span class="keyword">if</span> (e.getSource() == divButton) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> tempFirst = Double.parseDouble(display);</span><br><span class="line"> operator = <span class="string">&#x27;/&#x27;</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> display = <span class="string">&quot;&quot;</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125; <span class="keyword">else</span> <span class="keyword">if</span> (e.getSource() == powButton) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> tempFirst = Double.parseDouble(display);</span><br><span class="line"> operator = <span class="string">&#x27;^&#x27;</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> display = <span class="string">&quot;&quot;</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125; <span class="keyword">else</span> <span class="keyword">if</span> (e.getSource() == sqrtButton) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> display = String.valueOf(Math.sqrt(Double.parseDouble(display)));</span><br><span class="line"> textField.setText(display);</span><br><span class="line"> history.add(display);</span><br><span class="line"> display = <span class="string">&quot;&quot;</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125; <span class="keyword">else</span> <span class="keyword">if</span> (e.getSource() == sinButton) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> display = String.valueOf(Math.sin(Math.toRadians(Double.parseDouble(display))));</span><br><span class="line"> textField.setText(display);</span><br><span class="line"> history.add(display);</span><br><span class="line"> display = <span class="string">&quot;&quot;</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125; <span class="keyword">else</span> <span class="keyword">if</span> (e.getSource() == cosButton) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> display = String.valueOf(Math.cos(Math.toRadians(Double.parseDouble(display))));</span><br><span class="line"> textField.setText(display);</span><br><span class="line"> history.add(display);</span><br><span class="line"> display = <span class="string">&quot;&quot;</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125; <span class="keyword">else</span> <span class="keyword">if</span> (e.getSource() == tanButton) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> display = String.valueOf(Math.tan(Math.toRadians(Double.parseDouble(display))));</span><br><span class="line"> textField.setText(display);</span><br><span class="line"> history.add(display);</span><br><span class="line"> display = <span class="string">&quot;&quot;</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125; <span class="keyword">else</span> <span class="keyword">if</span> (e.getSource() == equalButton) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> tempSecond = Double.parseDouble(display);</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">switch</span> (operator) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">case</span> <span class="string">&#x27;+&#x27;</span>:</span><br><span class="line"> display = String.valueOf(tempFirst + tempSecond);</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">break</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">case</span> <span class="string">&#x27;-&#x27;</span>:</span><br><span class="line"> display = String.valueOf(tempFirst - tempSecond);</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">break</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">case</span> <span class="string">&#x27;*&#x27;</span>:</span><br><span class="line"> display = String.valueOf(tempFirst * tempSecond);</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">break</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">case</span> <span class="string">&#x27;/&#x27;</span>:</span><br><span class="line"> display = String.valueOf(tempFirst / tempSecond);</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">break</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">case</span> <span class="string">&#x27;^&#x27;</span>:</span><br><span class="line"> display = String.valueOf(Math.pow(tempFirst, tempSecond));</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">break</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> textField.setText(display);</span><br><span class="line"> history.add(display);</span><br><span class="line"> tempFirst = <span class="number">0</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> tempSecond = <span class="number">0</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> display = <span class="string">&quot;&quot;</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125; <span class="keyword">else</span> <span class="keyword">if</span> (e.getSource() == clearButton) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> textField.setText(<span class="string">&quot;&quot;</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> display = <span class="string">&quot;&quot;</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> tempFirst = <span class="number">0</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> tempSecond = <span class="number">0</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125; <span class="keyword">else</span> <span class="keyword">if</span> (e.getSource() == historyButton) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(<span class="built_in">this</span>, String.join(<span class="string">&quot;\n&quot;</span>, history));</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;<span class="keyword">else</span> <span class="keyword">if</span> (e.getSource() == dotButton) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">if</span> (!display.contains(<span class="string">&quot;.&quot;</span>)) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> display += <span class="string">&quot;.&quot;</span>;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> textField.setText(display);</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">public</span> <span class="keyword">static</span> <span class="keyword">void</span> <span class="title function_">main</span><span class="params">(String[] args)</span> &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">AdvancedCalculator</span>();</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line">&#125;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <h2 id="代码运行截图"><a class="markdownIt-Anchor" href="#代码运行截图">#</a> 代码运行截图</h2> <p><img data-src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/chulianyuang/imap/202312052128297.png" alt="image-20231205212832973"></p>
